name: Orbit Arcade
description:
This project is still a work in progress but i would love to hear some ideas and see what you guys think.

basic controls if your stuck, click to create planet and when you feel like you have created a stable solar system, click done to test it and see what score you can get.

scoring works though the amount of planets that remain in orbit over time, how close each planet is to the sun and you have less time the more planets you add.

good luck and have fun!

Sun drawn by Beck Morgan.
